entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow mixed with rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow at times mixed with rain beginning early this morning then changing to rain this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain this morning. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to light snow before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the morning then steady.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the morning then steady. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
